directions: Combine ahi cubes, soy sauce, Maui onion, green onion, chile pepper, sesame oil, sesame seeds, macadamia nuts, ginger, and sea salt in a large bowl.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh ahi steaks, cut into small cubes
2 teaspoons finely chopped toasted macadamia nuts (optional)
title: Ahi Shoyu Poke
